solution: In Streamlit, setting session_state flags in a button callback without calling st.rerun() means the UI won't update — the flag is set but Streamlit doesn't re-render. Fix: always call st.rerun() after on_click callbacks that change navigation state. Pattern: callback sets flag → st.rerun() → next render reads flag and renders target view.
summary: Fix for: Streamlit button callback sets state but no st.rerun() — UI doesn't navigate
